metadata.dc:author: Pelegrino, J L
Fernández Martínez, A
Fuentes González, O
Castex Rodríguez, M
metadata.dc:description: We show the culicids collected in the Guajaibón zone, in Havana Province, in order to characterize the present population according to ecological parameters and the possible risk for man. We show that Aedes scapularis is numerically and ecologically dominant over the rest of the species that attack men, as well as the possible indirect influence of culicid populations in crab caves upon human beings.
metadata.dc:title: Apuntes ecológicos sobre la circulación de arbovirus en la costa norte de la provincia La Habana. I. Colecta de culícidos en la región de Guajaibón.
[Ecological parameters of arbovirus circulation on the north coast of Havana. I. Collection of culicids in the Guajaibon region].
